scripts.create:claudia:dev: node ./generateEnvJson.js && claudia create --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --use-s3-bucket case-expense-app-deployment-dev --region us-east-1 --name expense-app-api-dev --runtime nodejs20.x --set-env-from-json ./env-variables.json --role expense-api-lambda-dev
scripts.create:claudia:prod: node ./generateEnvJson.js && claudia create --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --use-s3-bucket case-expense-app-deployment-prod --region us-east-1 --name expense-app-api-prod --runtime nodejs20.x --set-env-from-json ./env-variables.json --role expense-api-lambda-prod
scripts.create:claudia:test: node ./generateEnvJson.js && claudia create --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --use-s3-bucket case-expense-app-deployment-test --region us-east-1 --name expense-app-api-test --runtime nodejs20.x --set-env-from-json ./env-variables.json --role expense-api-lambda-test
scripts.deploy:cloudformation:dev: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name expense-app-dev --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:cloudformation:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name expense-app-prod --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:cloudformation:test: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name expense-app-test --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:support:cloudformation:dev: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-support.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name expense-app-support-dev --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:support:cloudformation:prod: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-support.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name expense-app-support-prod --region us-east-1
scripts.deploy:support:cloudformation:test: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file packaged-support.yaml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM --stack-name expense-app-support-test --region us-east-1
scripts.predeploy:dev: npm run download:dev && npm run reinstall:layers
scripts.deploy:dev: npm run deploy:claudia:dev && npm run tag:dev && npm run package:cloudformation:dev && npm run deploy:cloudformation:dev
scripts.predeploy:prod: export AWS_PROFILE=prod && npm run download:prod && npm run reinstall:layers
scripts.deploy:prod: npm run deploy:claudia:prod && npm run tag:prod && npm run package:cloudformation:prod && npm run deploy:cloudformation:prod
scripts.predeploy:test: npm run download:test && npm run reinstall:layers
scripts.deploy:test: npm run deploy:claudia:test && npm run tag:test && npm run package:cloudformation:test && npm run deploy:cloudformation:test
scripts.deploy:support:dev: npm run package:support:cloudformation:dev && npm run deploy:support:cloudformation:dev
scripts.deploy:support:prod: npm run package:support:cloudformation:prod && npm run deploy:support:cloudformation:prod
scripts.deploy:support:test: npm run package:support:cloudformation:test && npm run deploy:support:cloudformation:test
scripts.download:dev: npm run download:dev:env && npm run download:dev:claudia
scripts.download:dev:env: echo .env chronos/.env chiron/.env thanos/.env | xargs -n 1 aws s3 cp s3://case-expense-app-resources-dev/.env
scripts.download:local:env: echo .env chronos/.env chiron/.env thanos/.env | xargs -n 1 aws s3 cp s3://case-expense-app-resources-local/.env
scripts.download:prod: npm run download:prod:env && npm run download:prod:claudia
scripts.download:prod:env: echo .env chronos/.env chiron/.env thanos/.env | xargs -n 1 aws s3 cp s3://case-consulting-expense-app-resources-prod/.env
scripts.download:test: npm run download:test:env && npm run download:test:claudia
scripts.download:test:env: echo .env chronos/.env chiron/.env thanos/.env | xargs -n 1 aws s3 cp s3://case-expense-app-resources-test/.env
scripts.invoke:chiron: sam local invoke ChironFunction --env-vars env.json --no-event --template CloudFormation.yaml
scripts.invoke:chronos: sam local invoke ChronosFunction --env-vars env.json --no-event --template CloudFormation.yaml
scripts.invoke:thanos: sam local invoke ThanosFunction --env-vars env.json --no-event --template CloudFormation.yaml
scripts.package:cloudformation:dev: aws cloudformation package --template-file CloudFormation.yaml --s3-bucket case-expense-app-resources-dev --s3-prefix expense-app-api --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.package:cloudformation:prod: aws cloudformation package --template-file CloudFormation.yaml --s3-bucket case-consulting-expense-app-resources-prod --s3-prefix expense-app-api --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.package:cloudformation:test: aws cloudformation package --template-file CloudFormation.yaml --s3-bucket case-expense-app-resources-test --s3-prefix expense-app-api --output-template-file packaged.yaml
scripts.package:support:cloudformation:dev: aws cloudformation package --template-file support.yaml --s3-bucket case-expense-app-resources-dev --s3-prefix expense-app-api --output-template-file packaged-support.yaml
scripts.package:support:cloudformation:prod: aws cloudformation package --template-file support.yaml --s3-bucket case-consulting-expense-app-resources-prod --s3-prefix expense-app-api --output-template-file packaged-support.yaml
scripts.package:support:cloudformation:test: aws cloudformation package --template-file support.yaml --s3-bucket case-expense-app-resources-test --s3-prefix expense-app-api --output-template-file packaged-support.yaml
scripts.precommit: npm run validate && npm run eslint && npm run test
scripts.reinstall: npm install && npm ci && npm run reinstall:chiron && npm run reinstall:chronos && npm run reinstall:portal-data-sync && npm run reinstall:thanos && npm run reinstall:layers
scripts.reinstall:chiron: cd chiron && npm install && npm ci
scripts.reinstall:chronos: cd chronos && npm install && npm ci
scripts.reinstall:layers: (cd layers/dependencies/nodejs && npm install && npm ci) && (cd layers/shared/nodejs && npm install && npm ci)
scripts.reinstall:portal-data-sync: cd portal-data-sync && npm install && npm ci
scripts.reinstall:thanos: cd thanos && npm install && npm ci
